name: Strahd Zombie
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.Loathsome Limbs: Whenever the zombie takes at least 5 bludgeoning or slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:

actions.Multiattack: The zombie makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
